intro: Alyxia lehtungensis, commonly known as the Lehtung alyxia, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the Apocynaceae family, which includes milkweeds and related species. The plant is characterized by its woody stems and opposite, ovate leaves. It produces small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale pink in color. Alyxia lehtungensis is often found in tropical and subtropical regions, growing in moist, shaded environments.
